methods.description: Retrieves details of a customers account

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: A unique identifier of your application that is generated by the API portal.

parameters.name: apiSecret
parameters.description: Another unique identifier for your application.

parameters.name: apiTicket
parameters.description: Ticket Granting Ticket obtained from a previous request

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: territory
parameters.description: Territory from which request originates

parameters.name: languageAsPerTerritory
parameters.description: Defines response field name language, true (default) returns in language defined by territory, false returns in English

methods.description: Sets a flag based on name to value provided for the user.

parameters.description: A two-character ISO 3166-1-Alpha-2 code representing the country API to use.

parameters.name: territory
parameters.description: Territory from which request originates

parameters.name: languageAsPerTerritory
parameters.description: Defines response field name language, true (default) returns in language defined by territory, false returns in English

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: A unique identifier of your application that is generated by the API portal.

parameters.name: apiSecret
parameters.description: Another unique identifier for your application.

parameters.name: apiTicket
parameters.description: Ticket Granting Ticket obtained from a previous request

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to return (Used with pageSize)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: The FROM datetime from payments to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: The TO datetime for payments to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The order the response will be retuned by. i.e. date,desc

parameters.name: transactionType
parameters.description: Allows the user to select with they want to see withdrawls or deposits. If it is omitted from the query both types will be returned

parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

apiDescription: The Accounts API is a collection of methods used to query a customer account. It allows the developer to retrieve account-related data such as the user account balance. It should be noted that regional variations may exist - so some fields may not be returned for certain territories.
